title: System Settings

overview.summary: Central configuration hub for all system-wide settings affecting performance, security, legal workflows, integrations, and data management across the entire organization.
overview.systemWideImpact: Changes made here propagate immediately to ALL active user sessions. Some settings require page refresh to take effect. Critical settings trigger confirmation dialogs.
overview.governanceNote: All setting modifications are logged in the Audit Log with timestamp, user ID, old value, and new value for compliance and security review.
overview.accessControl: Only users with 'settings.admin' permission can modify these settings. Partners have view-only access to understand system behavior.

criticality.reason: Misconfiguration can lock out users, expose sensitive data, break integrations, or cause data loss
criticality.changeManagement: Document all changes in ticketing system before implementation

admin.description: Complete access to all settings including security and data management
responsibilities: Configure and maintain all system settings
Monitor audit log for unauthorized changes

implementor.description: Full access during deployment phase, limited after go-live
responsibilities: Hand off to admin team post go-live

partner.description: Can view settings to understand system behavior

quickTips: Always export a backup before making significant configuration changes
Test notification settings with a single user before enabling for all
Use sandbox mode for GST integration testing before switching to production
Document all custom configurations in your organization's knowledge base
Review the audit log monthly for unexpected setting changes
